text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump AMAZING! I DON'T CARE ABOUT 110K DEAD, 1.93M confirmed #COVID19 cases 40M unemployed, police brutality, JUSTICE FOR BLACKS. INCREDIBLE! Because all I care is MONEY for me, for rich Americans who're donating to myself and my campaign. So even with my optimism @JoeBiden will win!
